tool_description: Creates customizable email and SMS templates for review requests with dynamic content placeholders and brand consistency.

template_type.description: Type of template to create: email, sms, or push_notification

message_tone.description: Tone of the message: friendly, professional, casual, or urgent

include_incentive.description: Whether to include a discount or reward incentive

incentive_type.description: Type of incentive: discount_percentage, fixed_amount, or points

incentive_value.description: Value of the incentive (percentage for discount, amount for fixed)

brand_name.description: Name of the brand/company sending the request

review_platform.description: Platform where reviews should be left: website, google, amazon, or multiple

error_messages: Invalid template type: Must be one of [email, sms, push_notification].
Invalid message tone: Must be one of [friendly, professional, casual, urgent].
Incentive configuration error: If include_incentive is true, both incentive_type and incentive_value must be provided.
Invalid incentive type: Must be one of [discount_percentage, fixed_amount, points].
Invalid incentive value: Must be a positive number greater than 0.
Invalid review platform: Must be one of [website, google, amazon, multiple].
Empty brand name: brand_name cannot be empty.
usage: Configure the template parameters including type, tone, incentives, and branding. The tool generates a template with placeholder variables for personalization.

template_id.description: Unique identifier for the created template

template_content.description: The complete template with placeholder variables

subject_line.description: Subject line for email templates or title for other types

character_count.description: Total character count of the template

placeholders.description: List of placeholder variables that need to be filled
